ErrorCode.name: InitializeACACorrError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Initilization of ACA correlator is failed
ErrorCode.description: Initialization of ACA correlator is failed - Check that all components are correctly loaded

ErrorCode.name: InvalidACACorrNumber
ErrorCode.description: Out of range or undefined ACA correlator Number

ErrorCode.name: InvalidParameter
ErrorCode.description: Parametr(i.g moduleId, programType, cardId) is not previously defined.

ErrorCode.name: FailedToDownload
ErrorCode.description: Failed to response data from ACA correlator HW.(i.g response time out, invalid completion code from HW)

ErrorCode.name: SelfTestForACACorrelatorError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Failed to self-test of ACA correlator
ErrorCode.description: The runtime error while executing self-test of ACA correlator.(i.g observation confilict, Failed to response from ACA correlator, etc)

ErrorCode.name: GetProgramVersionError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Failed to get program version of ACA correlator
ErrorCode.description: Failed to get program version of ACA correlator.(i.g observation confilict, Failed to response from ACA correlator, etc)

ErrorCode.name: GetModuleSerialNumbersError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Failed to get ACA correlator serial numbers
ErrorCode.description: Failed to get module serial numbers of ACA correlator.(i.g observation confilict, Failed to response from ACA correlator, etc)

ErrorCode.name: CDPMasterError
ErrorCode.description: The CDP Master error when executing method

ErrorCode.name: CDPNodeError
ErrorCode.description: The CDP Computing Node error when executing method

ErrorCode.name: FailedToSetCAIConnecitivity
ErrorCode.description: Failed to set CAI connecitivity.(i.g invalid argument, The specified CAIs were out of range)
